trends: There have been no other sightings in Sawyer
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details approx three years ago in november,i was outside my house in s.e. oklahoma about 3 or 4 in the morning observing the leonid meteor shower. i had seen several in about 45 min. i was looking to the east when i saw a very bright blue\white light that i first thought was " a really good one". while the meteors that i had been seeing lasted no more than 2 or 3 seconds, this object was lasting much longer. i remember having the following thoughts in rapid succession;"wow,that's a really good one". then "that's lasting a long time". at this time i had been observing the object for more than 10 seconds.my next thought was wondering if it would actually impact. then i remember thinking "that's not a meteor". at about the time i had that thought, the object made what appeared to be a 90 degree turn to the south without any apparent change in velocity. i continued to observe the object which did not disappear over the horizon but seemed to go up and out at a very high rate of speed. i watched until as the object grew dimmer and finally to faint to see. i have believed in life on other planets and in e.t. u.f.o.s and i think i have finally seen the latter. because of the stigma attached to such things,i have only told one person about this until today.
Summary: a bright "welding arc" type light moving from East to West then South.
